directions: Stir potatoes, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, evaporated milk, vegetable broth, sweet onion, celery, garlic powder, dried chives, Worcestershire sauce, and black pepper together in a slow cooker. Cook 6 hours on Low, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen cubed hash brown potatoes
1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel sweet corn
title: Slow Cooker Potato Corn Chowder
